Title: Kirks Folly Watch With All That Flies On The Watch Band.  Rare Gold Tone
Description: Rare Kirks Folly Watch. Every thing on the watch band flies. On one side you have a fairy and butterfly, airplane blades that move and Some kind of flying animal. The other side has a flying ballon, a dove with clear crystals and and flying animal facing the other way then the opposite one. The watch does need a battery. Thank you for your interest !
